import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { MyContext, MyContextProvider } from "./MyContext"; import Card from "./Card"; function AllData() { const { //state: name, email, password, nameError, emailError, passwError, depositAmount, balance, numberError, successMessageVisible, withdrawSuccessMessageVisible, withdrawAmount, withdrawError, //functions: validate, handleClick, handleNameChange, handleEmailChange, handlePasswordChange, clearForm, validateNr, handleChange, submitDeposit, showHideSuccessMessage, withdrawHandleChange, submitWithdrawal, showHideSuccessMessageWithdraw } = useContext(MyContext); return (
All Your Data in one spot!
<>
Personal Information
Name: {name}
Email address: {email}
Password: {password}

Past Transactions
Deposited Amount: {depositAmount}
Withdrawn amount: {withdrawAmount}
Current balance: {balance}
} /> ); } export default AllData;
